rules_text:
Choose two –
• Each player discards their hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.
• Each opponent loses life equal to the number of cards you’ve drawn this turn.
• Rahstahde’s Command deals damage to each creature equal to the number of cards you’ve drawn this turn.
• Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token for each card you’ve drawn this turn.
